name: Nancy Drew®: Ghost Dogs of Moon Lake
description: Hunt for Clues on the Trail of a Pack of Phantom Hounds!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista Processor: 200MHz CPU Memory: 16MB RAM Graphics: 16-bit DirectX 7.0 compatible DirectX®: DirectX 7 or higher Hard Drive: 160MB of free space Sound: 16-bit sound card

reviews.review_text: By far the best nancy drew game!
Good characters, nice plot, and some really great music! The only thing I didn't like was the forest section, and the task list. They both got a little tedious and slow at times. 4/5
